page.title: 05GOING SHOPPING,PLOCKTON.
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT A SURVEY TO FIND OUT ABOUT LOCAL SHOPPING HABITS.THE{ {PLOCKTON STORES}IS OUR GROCERY SHOP AND MOST PEOPLE SHOP THERE DAILY, OR 2 OR 3 TIMES WEEKLY.SOME GO TO{KYLE} REGULARLY.MOST PEOPLE BUY THEIR MEAT FROM THE TRAVELLING BUTCHER,FISH FROM THE FISH VAN AND A FEW BUY MILK FROM A MILK VAN.THE NEWSPAPERS COME BY TRAIN DAILY FROM{INVERNESS.}TO BUY{CLOTHES,} THINGS FOR THE{HOUSE,}AND DO A BIG {SUPERMARKET}SHOPPING,WE GO TO{ {INVERNESS}SEVERAL TIMES A YEAR.MOST TRAVEL THE{85 MILES}BY CAR,BUT A FEW USE THE TRAIN.ALMOST ALL FAMILIES BUY FROM A{MAIL ORDER CATALOGUE. { DISADVANTAGES}OF SHOPPING HERE WERE FOUND TO BE{HIGH PRICES}CAUSED BY REMOTENESS,WITH LACK OF{CHOICE} SOMETIMES A PROBLEM.THE{BENEFITS}ARE FRIENDLY HELPFUL{SERVICE}WITH FEW LONG {QUEUES.
